com.googlecode.csse460_2010.server
Class LogHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Handler
      com.googlecode.csse460_2010.server.LogHandler

public class LogHandler
extends java.util.logging.Handler

This is the logging class. It will enable the game to be launched as a background application. The server admin can then access the log file and see all the logging information. The output is an XML file. Based on http://publib .boulder.ibm.com/infocenter/wasinfo/v6r0/index.jsp?topic=/com.ibm .websphere.express.doc/info/exp/ae/rtrb_createhandler.html

Author:
Christopher Rabotin
